name: afpuzzle
description:
Ok. so why should I play it ?
This is none other than your usual Taquin game BUT with  new challenging modes, a really cool interface and a customizing feature (you can use your own pictures).
 Flex with your friend by solving a puzzle and taking a screenshot of your gameplay.
Modes
Each mode increases the score multiplier in a particular way.
This game contains a total of three modes: Flashlight (FL), Hidden (HD) and Random Hole (RH).
